properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 28 at 7:35AM CST until January 28 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet. Winds near 20 knots and gusty
diminishing by late morning to around 15 knots.

* WHERE...Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from
20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING
